trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Inverness
There were no other sightings in Inverness on or around January 27th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswhile walking the dog on a main road i saw a revolving ball of light at approx. 50-100feet in the air travelling horizontally in a straight line. No noise the sky was clear no rain or clouds. It was not a helicopter or aeroplane i am positive of that The light i seen seemed to be on a dark object but could not make it out properly as the light revolving around it took my attention for the 10 seconds or so i seen it. It was heading in the direction of a transmitter mast on a area called the Black Isle in Inverness-shire Scotland. When i started to try and type what i had seen i found it very difficult to type properly i thought there was something wrong with my keyboard i couldn't realy understand what i had seen and then try and put it into words, i felt a bit odd to be honest any ideas thanks Ian calderwood
